title: Ticket #2621: condor_ssh_to_job sessions inherit starter environment
description: The user's shell inherits the starter's environment with job environment settings overlaid. The desired behavior is for the environment to be set up the same way as the in the job. Therefore, inheritance of the starter environment should only happen when JOB_INHERITS_STARTER_ENVIRONMENT=true. Currently it always happens.
